full_summary:
====================================

### Translate Services Tender for Transport Canada

#### Reference Information

*   Reference Number: PW-22-01014874
*   Solicitation Number: T8080-220271 (Second Amendment) 
*   Publication Date: November 25, 2022
*   Tender Closing Date: January 6, 2023, at 15:00 PM (Eastern Standard Time)
*   Amendment Date: December 23, 2022

#### Overview
The Multimodal Integrated Technical Training branch at Transport Canada is seeking translation services for all Safety and Security modes/programs. The selected service provider will be responsible for translating all courses while ensuring key factors such as cost efficiency, quality assurance, and timeliness are met.

#### Key Details
*   Contract duration: From the contract date to March 31, 2024, inclusive.
*   Expected statistical breakdown by language:
     *   English (target 50-60% of total production)
     *   French (target 40-50% of total production)
     *   Other languages (target 0-10% of total production)

#### Company Information (PARTICIPANT)
*   [PARTICIPANT NAME]

#### Company Information (PARTICIPANT)
To participate in this tender, your company must adhere to the contract's eligibility criteria which you can find attached in the tender documentation. In summary, you must be a registered vendor who has experience in translation services. Your company should also have a solid understanding of the nuances of translating complex technical texts.

#### Procurement Method
The procurement method for this tender is Competitive – Open Bidding. This means that any eligible company can submit a proposal, and the contract will be awarded to the successful bidder.

#### Contract Details
